document.full_text: the rangers' ian kinsler and nelson cruz became the first set of teammates to hit a home run in each of the first three games in a season.
document.title: roundup: two rangers achieve unique home run streaks to cap sweep of red sox
lines_and_colors: the rangers' ian kinsler and nelson cruz became the first set of teammates to hit a home run in each of the first three games in a season.
